artist: Author: Chris Flash , et al.; Publisher: SHADOW Press, New York
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Loose, folded leaves, photographic image of the World Trade Center on 9/11, with text and designs, printed in offset lithography on newsprint; 19 pp.
medium: Offset lithography, letterpress; loose, folded leaves
title: The Shadow, no. 46: Smoke and Mirrors: Who Really Bombed the WTC This Time?
